main.name: Abhi Balijepalli
main.description: Hi, I'm a undergrad at Oregon State University studying computer science. Some of my interests are Full-Stack, ML/AI, and Unix Systems. Check out my projects down below
main.bio: I was born in india but spent most of my life in Singapore and Seattle,WA. I like to spend my time reading, hiking and biking. My hoobies are photography and play videos games.
main.contactmessage: Contact me if you wanna chat about tech

resume.skillmessage: Here are my top programming languages that i use daily!

education.description: Computer Science with a focus in Artificial Intelligence

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Created a highly scalable App for restaurant delivery services for enterprises and firms using React-Native as well as authentication and database pipeline using Google Firebase console.
work.tech: React-Native, ReactJs, Firebase Console, Microsoft Azure, OAuth

work.title: Team Lead
work.description: Worked with a sub-team of 6 people to create robotics software for an underwater remote operated vehicle to compete in the MATE International challenge, while communicating with the school board to approve funding and expenses.
work.tech: Python, NodeJs, PCB Design, HTML/CSS, C

work.title: Undergraduate Researcher
work.description: Researched and invented an automated glucose pump for diabetic infants using proportional and derivative controllers to predict stable states which communicates with a Dexcom sensor.

projects.title: Pinterlist
projects.category: (Template_Draft) A webscrapper for pinterest that extracts ingredients from long and boring cooking blogs.

projects.title: Multi-Threaded Processing
projects.category: (Source Code) Shows a producer and consumer way of communicating through 4 threads and 3 buffers.

projects.title: One Time Pads
projects.category: (Source Code) Client and Server communication to decrypt and encrypt files concurrently on a network.

projects.title: Map Reduce (Rust)
